Question
========

Suppose a stochastic variable T follows a T-distribution with 10 degrees of freedom. Then P(T > 1.8125) is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.025
* 0.05
* 0.1
* 0.95

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.025: Incorrect
* 0.05: Correct
* 0.1: Incorrect
* 0.95: Incorrect
